hasMessage.hasTextContent: Xipamide   is predicted to   cause   hypokalaemia (potentially increasing the risk of torsade de pointes) when given with   sunitinib .  Manufacturer makes no recommendation .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both sunitinib and zuclopenthixol prolong the QT interval. Most manufacturers advise avoiding the use of two or more drugs that are associated with QT prolongation. Increasing age, female sex, cardiac disease, and some metabolic disturbances (notably hypokalaemia) predispose to QT prolongation.
